WorkItem.ClosedComment: I have both installed on my machine and that works as expected, but they have to be the same version. We'll make sure this scenario works as expected in the next release.
WorkItem.Description:
I am using NodeJs version 0.10.15 and TSC 0.9.1.1 on a windows 8.1 system.

I did _"npm install -g typescript"_ then when I do anything with tsc (like _"tsc - v"_) it just spits out _"Cannot Initialize ActiveScript"_
WorkItem.Summary: Cannot initialize ActiveScript with Typescript 0.9.1.1 in NodeJS

Comments.Message: Just to be clear, you installed both the Visual Studio tools and the npm package?

After checking, yes I did have the visual studio tools installed on this system, as I use Typescript on various projects, one is ASP.MVC one is NodeJS and a few other projects depending on what I need to work on.

I have removed it now and it works fine in NodeJS, am I only able to use it on one platform at a time?
